title: Thai Pongal celebrated at Temple Trees
content: By Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva The National Thai Pongal Festival was held on a very grand scale under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa and First Lady Shiranthi Rajapaksa at the Temple Trees yesterday on 16 January.
